title: Gulf Islands National Seashore: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar        Download the Gulf Islands National Seashore August 2016 Program Schedule.          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 18 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Gulf Islands National Seashore Advanced Redoubt: Legacy in Brick & Mortar      Time: 12:30 PM to 1:00 PM Location: Advanced Redoubt Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Meet a national park ranger or volunteer at the entrance to the Advanced Redoubt for this 30 minute tour of the historic fort. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore All About Amazing Alligators      Time: 10:30 AM to 11:00 AM,3:00 PM to 3:30 PM Location: William M. Colmer Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly  from 07/31/2016 to 08/28/2016 This 30-minute guided program meets at the Nature's Way Loop Trail. This program is accessible and great for families with small children. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore Fort Barrancas: Guardian of the Gulf      Time: 2:00 PM to 2:30 PM Location: Fort Barrancas Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 07/31/2016 to 08/31/2016 Meet a national park ranger or volunteer at the Fort Barrancas Visitor Center for this walking tour of the historic fort that guarded Pensacola Bay for over a century.  This program will not be offered on Saturday 12/26/15. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore Fort Massachusetts: Silent Sentinel      Time: 10:15 AM to 10:45 AM,1:15 PM to 1:45 PM Location: Fort Massachusetts - West Ship Island Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Meet a national park ranger or volunteer near the entrance to Fort Massachusetts. This program is accessible. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore Fort Pickens: Garrison for Freedom      Time: 2:00 PM to 2:30 PM Location: Fort Pickens Fees: Entrance Fee Required     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 07/31/2016 to 08/31/2016 Meet a national park ranger or volunteer at the entrance to Fort Pickens for this walking program about the history of this incredible fort. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore Life on a Barrier Island      Time: 12:30 PM to 1:00 PM Location: Fort Pickens Area - Battery Worth Picnic Shelter Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 07/31/2016 to 08/28/2016 Meet a ranger or volunteer at the the Battery Worth Picnic Shelter for this fun program about life on a barrier island. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore Naval Live Oaks Kayaking 101      Time: 9:30 AM to 10:30 AM Location: Naval Live Oaks Area Fees: FREE     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 07/31/2016 to 08/28/2016 Kayaking is a great way to explore the emerald waters and delicate seagrass beds of Gulf Islands National Seashore.  Reservations are required.  Call 850-916-5670 to make a reservation. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore Naval Live Oaks Kayaking 101      Time: 12:30 PM to 1:30 PM Location: Naval Live Oaks Area Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly  from 07/31/2016 to 08/28/2016 Kayaking is a great way to explore the emerald waters and delicate seagrass beds of Gulf Islands National Seashore.  Reservations are required.  Call 850-916-5670 to make a reservation. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore Totally Turtles!      Time: 3:30 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Fort Pickens Museum Fees: FREE - Entrance Fee Required     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 07/31/2016 to 08/30/2016 The staff at Gulf Islands National Seashore loves our baby sea turtles!  And we work hard to protect these amazing creatures.  Learn more about the challenges baby sea turtles face and ways that you can help protect them. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore Chick Chat      Time: 3:30 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Fort Pickens Area - Battery Worth Picnic Shelter Fees: Free     Monday, August 15, 2016 Every Monday Weekly & Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly  from 08/01/2016 to 08/31/2016 Join a national park ranger or volunteer and learn about the shorebirds that call Gulf Islands National Seashore home. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore Davis Bayou Kayaking 101      Time: 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM,10:00 AM to 11:00 AM,11:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Davis Bayou Fees: Free     Monday, August 15, 2016 Every Monday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 08/01/2016 to 08/29/2016 Reservations Required. Call 228-230-4100 to reserve your spot. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore Bayou By Boat      Time: 1:00 PM to 2:00 PM,2:00 PM to 3:00 PM,3:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Davis Bayou Fees: Free     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 08/03/2016 to 08/31/2016 Join a National Park Ranger and explore Davis Bayou by boat.  Reservations are required; call 228-230-4100.  This program is accessible, however, water level may affect accessibility. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore Dusk on the Bayou      Time: 7:15 PM to 7:45 PM Location: Davis Bayou Campground Fees: Free     Thursday, August 18, 2016 Every Thursday Weekly  from 08/04/2016 to 08/25/2016 This program is for registered campers.  Campers should meet at the campground amphitheater for the program. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore Underwater Snorkel Adventure      Time: 12:30 PM to 1:30 PM Location: Naval Live Oaks Area Fees: Free     Friday, August 19, 2016 Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 08/05/2016 to 08/27/2016 Meet a National Park Service Ranger outside the Headquarters building at the Naval Live Oaks Area and explore the wonders below the surface.  Space is limited; open to the first 25 visitors  View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore Bird Walk!      Time: 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM Location: Naval Live Oaks Area Fees: FREE     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Discover some of Gulf Islands' spring time residents during this stroll along the beach and maritime forest.  Fun for bird lovers of all ages and skill levels. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore Happy Birthday National Park Service!!      Time: 11:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Naval Live Oaks Area Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Meet outside HQ building. View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore National Park Service 100th Birthday Celebration      Location: Davis Bayou Area Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Help us celebrate a century of service and stewardship of your national parks!  Come to the visitor center at Davis Bayou for this special event. We will have fun activities for the whole family and, like any good birthday, there will be cake!  View Details      Gulf Islands National Seashore National Park Service Centennial Celebration      Time: 12:30 PM to 1:30 PM Location: West Ship Island Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Help us celebrate a century of service and stewardship of your national parks!  Join us on West Ship Island for this special event. We will have fun activities for the whole family and, like any good birthday, there will be cake! View Details
